name: product-service
description: Collaborative contracts example, using Dredd and OAS to validate the provider API

scripts.publish: pactflow publish-provider-contract oas/products.yml --provider sample-provider --provider-app-version 1.0.2 --broker-base-url https://cantirecorp.pactflow.io --broker-token PE0rMkaoJ4U504ZREcaBIw --branch $(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD) --content-type application/yaml --verification-exit-code=0 --verification-results output/report.md --verification-results-content-type "text/plain" --verifier dredd
scripts.can-i-deploy: pact-broker can-i-deploy --broker-base-url https://cantirecorp.pactflow.io --broker-token PE0rMkaoJ4U504ZREcaBIw --pacticipant sample-provider --version=1.0.2 --to-environment production
